trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGSAK6HHUSATAHWI_00880_HHUTEPI_000_000<tab>Welcome, traveler. If there's something I can help you with, don't hesitate to ask.

TEXT_REGSAK6HHUSATAHWI_00880_HHUTEPI_000_001<tab>Have you heard anything about those strange flying contraptions in the sky? They're just sitting there. Menacingly... So long as they're keen not to move, I try not to think about them. But anyway, something I can help you with, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>?
TEXT_REGSAK6HHUSATAHWI_00880_HHUTEPI_000_002<tab>It's a relief to look up and see a clear sky for a change. Finally starting to feel normal around here again.

TEXT_REGSAK6HHUSATAHWI_00880_HHUTEPI_000_003<tab>It's surprising how fast everyone's grown accustomed to the sight of the dome on the horizon. Now that they're free to come and go as they please, I'd be interested in sitting down for a drink with the good folks from inside. How about you?

TEXT_REGSAK6HHUSATAHWI_00880_HHUTEPI_000_004<tab>With as many merchants and travelers as we have passing through, we've had need for a guide to help folks find what they're looking for here. That's where I come in. The name's Hhutepi, by the way.

TEXT_REGSAK6HHUSATAHWI_00880_HHUTEPI_000_005<tab>Would that I could boast this is all out of the kindness of my own heart, but we've all got to make a living somehow. That's not to say I'll charge you, mind─the businesses offer me a fee to put would-be customers in contact with them.
TEXT_REGSAK6HHUSATAHWI_00880_HHUTEPI_000_006<tab>Simply put, this here's a trading town. Biggest one this side of Zorgor the Boundless, I'd wager.

TEXT_REGSAK6HHUSATAHWI_00880_HHUTEPI_000_007<tab>Mighty impressive considering there was nothing here but a few years ago. Kemakka and his family bought up the land, erected an aetheryte, then started building storage houses for imported goods.

TEXT_REGSAK6HHUSATAHWI_00880_HHUTEPI_000_008<tab>Thanks to travelers coming in from all corners of Tural, those storehouses were full to bursting before long. With so much merchandise moving through town, and the mining operations in the Springs, business is booming!
